title: Irritable Bowel Syndrome Overview
text: Irritable bowel syndrome is a gastrointestinal disorder with abdominal pain and altered bowel habits. Treatments include diet changes, fiber, and stress management.

title: Vitamin D Deficiency
text: Low vitamin D can cause fatigue, bone pain, and muscle weakness. Diagnosis is via blood test, and treatment includes supplements and sunlight exposure.

title: Chronic Kidney Disease Diet Tips
text: Managing chronic kidney disease often involves limiting sodium, phosphorus, and protein. Diet plans should be personalized with medical guidance.

title: Metformin Information
text: Metformin is commonly used for type 2 diabetes. Side effects can include nausea, diarrhea, and stomach upset, often improving over time.

title: Migraine Causes and Triggers
text: Migraines can be triggered by stress, sleep changes, certain foods, or hormones. Symptoms include headache, nausea, and sensitivity to light.
